content.body: Yeah, I was. I don't care too much about getting rid of the normal PI variant, I don't think that allows for much simplification of the model. At least not as long as everyone does XSLT.
Alan Stearns: heya, we revised the proposal for trivial changes to take into account the point you mentioned: https://github.com/whatwg/sg/issues/63#issuecomment-1387475350
content.formatted_body: Alan Stearns: heya, we revised the proposal for trivial changes to take into account the point you mentioned: https://github.com/whatwg/sg/issues/63#issuecomment-1387475350

content.body: (it's still very much tentative, but I thought I'd give an update)
